casebody.data:
HANSARD v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 21, 1922.) No. 145. George Wolf, of New York City (Abner Siegal, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Elmer H. Lemon, Special Asst. U. S. Atty., of Middletown, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before ROGERS HOUGH, and MANTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
